mapper.select: select m.*, NVL((select b.picture_filepath from tbl_board_picture b where m.member_id = b.member_id ),'') member_filepath from tbl_member_info m where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO TBL_BOARD_PICTURE p USING ( SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_MEMBER_INFO WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} ) m ON (p.member_id = m.member_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET p.picture_filepath = #{member_filepath} where p.member_id = #{member_id} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PICTURE_FILEPATH, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (#{member_filepath} , #{member_id} )
